SEARCH
Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.controller

Class QuizController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.QuizController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class QuizController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is the controller for the quiz page. It provides methods for initializing the controller, setting the exam, and updating the question list.

    void

    Sets the exam and initializes various data structures based on the questions in the exam.
    void
    setQuestion(Question question)
    Sets the current question and updates the UI based on the type of the question.
    void
    submit(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
    Saves the answers to the current question (if applicable), calculates the score of the exam, and displays an alert with the score.

    • setExam

      public void setExam(Exam exam)
      Sets the exam and initializes various data structures based on the questions in the exam.
      Parameters:
      exam - the exam to set
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the exam is null

    • setQuestion

      public void setQuestion(Question question)
      Sets the current question and updates the UI based on the type of the question.
      Parameters:
      question - the question to set as the current question
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the question is null

    • submit

      public void submit(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Saves the answers to the current question (if applicable), calculates the score of the exam, and displays an alert with the score.
      Parameters:
      e - the action event that triggered the submission of the exam
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the current question is null
